snippet: J. J. Hardy homered twice, doubled and drove in five runs as host Baltimore beat Tampa Bay, 9-2.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Baltimore Orioles beat the Tampa Bay Rays, 9-2; other MLB scores noted.
lead_paragraph: J. J. Hardy homered twice, doubled and drove in five runs as host Baltimore beat Tampa Bay, 9-2.

headline.seo: Orioles Rout Rays and Move Into Tie for First
headline.main: Hardy’s Big Night Against Rays Leads Orioles to First-Place Tie
headline.print_headline: Hardy’s Big Night Against Rays Leads Orioles to First-Place Tie
